name: 吳景龍
objective:
本課程帶領非英文系高級班的學生了解深植在英文詞句中的美國主流文化價值。學生除了會學到語言是了解文化的途徑之一外，也會理解文化對語言用詞的影響。課程內容涵蓋電影、電視節目、新聞、音樂劇、生活常用俚語等等。
This course enables non-English majors at the advanced level to understand American mainstream cultural values embedded in English language expressions. Students will learn that language is a guide to culture, and on the other hand, culture programs language patterns. Selected texts include films, television shows, news, musical, idiomatic expression, etc.
schedule:
Syllabus 課程表:
Theme One: News Media
Week 1: Introduction.
Week 2: Discuss issues and concepts raised in authentic news articles.
Week 3: Develop critical thinking about how to evaluate the validity and reliability of given information in news.
Week 4: Critique empirical articles worldwide and cultivate a personal take on reading news.
Week 5: How Headline is Formed in News Media.
Week 6: Reading Rules of Journalistic English 1.
Week 7: Reading Rules of Journalistic English 2.
Week 8: Reading Rules of Journalistic English 3 and practice .
Week 9: Midterm Exam or Report.

Theme Two: Entertainment: films, television shows, and musical
Week 10: Musical Phantom of the Opera.
Week 11: Musical Phantom of the Opera Dicussion; Musical Miss Saigon.
Week 12: Musical Miss Saigon and Miss Saigon Discussion.
Week 13: Movie Crach and Discussion.
Week 14: TV Show Friends and Discussion.

Theme Three: Idiomatic Expression 
Week 16: Idiomatic Expression 1.
Week 17: Idiomatic Expression 2.
Week 18: Final Exam or Report.
scorePolicy:
Percentile of final grades 成績配分:
1. Group presentation in the class or Midterm Exam:  20 %
2. Individual tasks (homework, or solo presentation): 20%
3. Attendance and participation in the classroom discussions: 40 % 
(five absences leading to failure)
4. English proficiency tests: 20%
